mapper.insert: insert into t_line(bus_name, full_name, first_stop, last_stop, deleted) values(#{busName}, #{fullName},#{firstStop}, #{lastStop}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: update t_line set bus_name=#{busName}, full_name=#{fullName}, first_stop=#{firstStop}, last_stop=#{lastStop}, deleted=#{deleted} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select tl.id as id, tl.bus_name as busName, tl.full_name as fullName, tl.first_stop as firstStop, tl.last_stop as lastStop, tl.deleted as deleted from t_line tl where id=#{lineId}
select tl.id as id, tl.bus_name as busName, tl.full_name as fullName, tl.first_stop as firstStop, tl.last_stop as lastStop, tl.deleted as deleted from t_line tl
select tl.id as id, tl.bus_name as busName, tl.full_name as fullName, tl.first_stop as firstStop, tl.last_stop as lastStop, tl.deleted as deleted from t_line tl where deleted=0
select tl.id as id, tl.bus_name as busName, tl.full_name as fullName, tl.first_stop as firstStop, tl.last_stop as lastStop, tl.deleted as deleted from t_line tl where deleted=1

select tl.id as id, tl.bus_name as busName, tl.full_name as fullName, tl.first_stop as firstStop, tl.last_stop as lastStop, tl.deleted as deleted from t_line tl where deleted=0 limit #{pageCurrent},#{pageSize};

select tl.id as id, tl.bus_name as busName, tl.full_name as fullName, tl.first_stop as firstStop, tl.last_stop as lastStop, tl.deleted as deleted from t_line tl where deleted=0 and (full_name like #{pattern} or first_stop like #{pattern} or last_stop like #{pattern})
select count(*) from t_line where deleted=0
